entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
